thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 3 of 171
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
We have used Trusted housesitters several times. We have been absolutely delighted with the people who have cared so expertly for our pets, home and garden.
The sitters have managed minor problems calmly and have kept us informed of any issues whilst we were away. Some sitters even sent photos of our dog having fun.
We have made new friends with our sitters; they have all been really interesting, fun, considerate, reliable and kind people. They have all had considerable experience of living in many parts of the world.
Highly recommend this website
